validationRules: block_id is required and must be unique 4-character hex string
style must be 'style-1' or 'style-2' (layout variants)
processSteps is an array with minimum 1 step (each step requires _key field)
Each step in processSteps must have title and desc (content)
selectIcon must be 'icon', 'image', or 'text' (determines step indicator type)
When selectIcon='icon': fontAwesomeIcon is required (Font Awesome class)
When selectIcon='image': stepImage.url is required
When selectIcon='text': stepText is required
displayCounter controls counter visibility (boolean)
When displayCounter=true: counterStyle required ('number_normal' or 'dc_custom_text')
When counterStyle='dc_custom_text': each step needs customText attribute
bType separator options: 'solid', 'dashed', 'dotted', 'custom'
When bType='custom': customImg.url is required for custom separator image
sepSize only applies to style-2 (horizontal separator width)
specialBG creates concentric circle background effect (boolean)
vertOnTablet switches to vertical layout on tablet devices (boolean)
nmlLoutMobile keeps normal (horizontal) layout on mobile (boolean)
carouselToggle enables carousel synchronization (boolean)
When carouselToggle=true: carouselID is required (must match carousel block_id)
dfltActive sets default active step ('none' or step index 0-based)
tpgbEqualHeight enables equal height containers (boolean)
When tpgbEqualHeight=true: equalUnqClass recommended for grouping
linkUrl is optional for each step (makes step clickable)
contentHeight can be set globally or per-step (min-height)
warnings: Don't forget _key field in processSteps array items (required for React rendering)
Don't mix selectIcon types inconsistently (pick icon, image, or text and stick with it)
sepSize only works with style-2, not style-1 (ignored for style-1)
customImg separator only works when bType='custom' (ignored otherwise)
specialBG effect may not work well with rectangular icon backgrounds (use circles)
vertOnTablet and nmlLoutMobile conflict (both true = confusing responsive behavior)
carouselID must exactly match the carousel block's block_id (case-sensitive)
dfltActive index is 0-based (first step = '0', second = '1', etc.)
Equal height (tpgbEqualHeight) may cause layout issues with varying content lengths
Don't use too many steps (5-7 max recommended for horizontal layouts)
Per-step contentHeight in repeater overrides global contentHeight
transformHvrCSS affects icons, images, AND text (not just backgrounds)
nmlOverlay/hvrOverlay use box-shadow inset trick (may conflict with other shadows)
Custom separator images should be small (max 50-100px) for performance
Responsive icon/text sizing requires separate md/sm/xs values
Counter positioning (counterLeftSpace, counterTopSpace) only works when displayCounter=true
imgSt2Align and cntntSt2Align only apply to style-2 (ignored for style-1)
Hover states (.active class) apply to both hover AND active carousel states
commonMistakes: Forgetting _key field in processSteps array items
Using string index instead of number for sepBSize (should be {md: '2', unit: 'px'})
Setting sepSize for style-1 (only works with style-2)
Using counterStyle='dc_custom_text' without customText in each step
Forgetting to enable openBg=1 before setting background colors/gradients
Not setting openTypography=1 before using typography values
Using carouselToggle without matching carouselID to actual carousel
Setting dfltActive to step count instead of index (5 steps = index 0-4, not 1-5)
Using tpgbEqualHeight with wildly different content lengths (causes squishing)
Not testing responsive layouts on actual tablets/mobile devices
Using transformHvrCSS without understanding it affects all indicator content
Using per-step iconNormalBG/iconHoverBG instead of global normalBG/hoverBG
Forgetting unit in size values (bgSize needs md and unit: 'px')
Not providing responsive alignment values for style-2 (imgSt2Align, cntntSt2Align)
bestPractices: Use 4-6 steps for horizontal layouts (more becomes crowded)
Use semantic step titles (verbs work best: 'Plan', 'Build', 'Launch')
Keep step descriptions concise (1-2 sentences max)
Use consistent selectIcon type across all steps (all icons, all images, or all text)
Match icon colors to brand palette
Use gradient backgrounds for modern, eye-catching designs
Add hover effects (scale, rotate) for interactive feel
Use connecting lines (separators) to show flow direction
Enable responsive layouts (vertOnTablet) for mobile-friendly designs
Use counters for numbered processes or custom labels for named phases
Link steps to relevant pages (linkUrl) for deeper exploration
Test carousel synchronization thoroughly (carouselToggle + carouselID)
Use equal height (tpgbEqualHeight) for consistent visual alignment
Provide adequate spacing between steps (repMargin, contentMargin)
Use shadows to create depth and visual hierarchy
Match separator colors to overall design (subtle for minimal, bold for emphasis)
Use custom separators (arrows, dots) for unique branding
Add transform effects for engaging micro-interactions
Use specialBG sparingly for premium, attention-grabbing sections
Ensure sufficient color contrast for accessibility (WCAG AA: 4.5:1)
Test on all screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Use style-1 for horizontal flows, style-2 for vertical timelines
Provide clear active states for carousel-synced steps
Use content backgrounds to separate steps visually
Match typography hierarchy to step importance
Use responsive sizing for icons and text on small screens

accessibilityNotes: Use semantic heading tags in title content (H2, H3 based on page structure)
Provide meaningful icon aria-labels when using fontAwesomeIcon
Ensure sufficient color contrast for text and icons (WCAG AA: 4.5:1)
Use linkUrl with descriptive text for screen readers
Test keyboard navigation through steps (Tab key should focus each step)
Provide alternative text for stepImage when using image indicators
Don't rely solely on color to convey active state (use borders, shadows, transforms)
Ensure counter text is large enough to read (min 14px recommended)
Test with screen readers to ensure steps are announced correctly
Use ARIA roles for better semantic structure (role='list' for container, role='listitem' for steps)
performanceConsiderations: Limit number of steps (5-7 max) to avoid layout overcrowding
Optimize stepImage files to <100KB for fast loading
Use CSS transforms instead of JavaScript for hover effects
Minimize use of box-shadows (combine normal and hover shadows efficiently)
Avoid large custom separator images (max 100px recommended)
Use equal height (tpgbEqualHeight) sparingly (can cause reflows)
Test carousel synchronization performance with multiple carousels
Lazy load images in stepImage when below fold
Use CSS gradients instead of image backgrounds when possible
Minimize use of specialBG (concentric circles) to 1-2 blocks per page
